API_Description: Represents the title of the document.
API_Description_Reason: The Title property typically refers to the title metadata of a document, which is a common attribute in document information objects.
Returns: The title of the document as a string.
Returns_Reason: Since the parameter type is specified as a string, it is reasonable to assume that the Title property returns a string representing the document's title.

type.description: The data type of the Title property.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' indicates the expected data type for the Title property, which is a common practice in API documentation to specify the type of data returned or accepted.
type.type_reason: The 'type' parameter is explicitly stated as a string, which aligns with the typical representation of a document title.
